<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hidden Paragon](/Feats.aspx?ID=4989) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=687" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 177 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
Legendary in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

**Trigger**
You successfully use Stealth to Hide and become hidden from all of your current foes, or use Stealth to Sneak and become undetected to all your current foes

</column>

---

When you slip out of sight, you disappear. You become invisible for 1 minute, even if you use a hostile action. Not even revealing light, see the unseen, or similar effects can reveal you, though creatures can still use the Seek action to locate you as normal.
name: Hidden Paragon
